mapper.select: select W.idx idx, W.receipt_idx receiptIdx, R.RECEIPT_CLF receiptClf, W.file_idx fileIdx, W.product_type productType, W.product_name productName, W.product_detail productDetail, (select score1 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score1, (select score2 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score2, (select score3 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score3, (select score4 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score4, (select totalscore from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as totalScore, (select valuer from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as valuer, (select DATE_FORMAT(evaldate,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') evalDate from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as evalDate from RECEIPT R left OUTER JOIN WORKS W on R.IDX = W.RECEIPT_IDX where W.product_type = 0 or W.product_type = 1

select W.idx idx, W.receipt_idx receiptIdx, R.RECEIPT_CLF receiptClf, W.file_idx fileIdx, W.product_type productType, W.product_name productName, W.product_detail productDetail, (select score1 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score1, (select score2 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score2, (select score3 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score3, (select score4 from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as score4, (select totalscore from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as totalScore, (select valuer from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as valuer, (select DATE_FORMAT(evaldate,'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') evalDate from EVALUATION where valuer = #{valuer} and WORK_IDX = W.idx) as evalDate from RECEIPT R left OUTER JOIN WORKS W on R.IDX = W.RECEIPT_IDX where (product_type=0 or product_type= 1) and W.idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVALUATION ( work_idx, score1, score2, score3, score4, valuer, evaldate ) VALUES ( #{idx}, #{score1}, #{score2}, #{score3}, #{score4}, #{valuer}, now() )
mapper.update: update EVALUATION set score1=#{score1}, score2=#{score2}, score3=#{score3}, score4=#{score4}, valuer=#{valuer}, evaldate=now() where work_idx=#{idx} and valuer=#{valuer}
